parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: searchExpression
parameters.description: The search expression to filter results. The search expression filters. (dict) --- A search filter. The field on which to filter. The operator to use for comparing the field's value with the provided value. The desired field value on which to filter.

nested_params.name: field
nested_params.description: The field on which to filter.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use for comparing the field's value with the provided value.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The desired field value on which to filter.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.

nested_items.name: assistantArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant.

nested_items.name: assistantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.

nested_items.name: sessionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session.
